column4: if you have added yourself you need to log out and back in to be a member or start a new shell
so just exit in the terminal?
just start a new shell
how would I do that inside a terminal window? it doesn't seem to work if I just open a new twerminal in gnome.
what is your username
andromeda
grep andromeda /etc/group
alright, the /etc/groups says I am a member of vpnc
ok - so do "id andromada" does that show you ?
it says vpnc in the list
ok, so log out and back in
sorry, I don't know how to log out and back in inside a terminal window.
just exit your desktop and log back in - it will be easier
oy, that means I lose everything I was working on :/
su - andromeda
that worked!!!
thanks
great,
just be aware it will only work in that one shell until you log out of gnome and back in
nice!!!
that is fine, I now have access to vpnc ^_^
ok, just keep that in mind
